1.content: hi me again welcome to my second interactive story this is where two different manga/anime collide. now were to start? O yes now i remember how about we choose which manga/anime to begin in now lets begin!!!
1.title: it begins

choices: tuskune and his friends were there
12.content: now we start in magic circles and seals class were they are trying out a new summon the teacher gave them. Shemia was the lucky student to try out the summoning ritual. she dropped her blood on the magic seal and recited the chant. soon there was a large puff of smoke and...
12.title: Blue exorsist

info.brief_description: a Rosario vampire and Blue exorcist crossover
info.description: a crossover story involving two manga with completely different ideals hope you enjoy
